alert.note: Alert for Milwaukee (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 04 at 3:34PM CDT until November 04 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL MILWAUKEE COUNTY... At 332 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northeastern Milwaukee, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Three quarter of an inch hail has been reported near State Fair Park. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Milwaukee, West Allis, Wauwatosa, Whitefish Bay, Fox Point, Bayside, West Milwaukee, Glendale, River Hills, Milwaukee Hoan Bridge, Shorewood, State Fair Park, Marquette University, UW- Milwaukee, Mitchell Park Domes, Milwaukee Co Zoo, AmFam Field and Maier Festival Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
